name: Best Game Ever (Brandmuffin, wgarland, RealSHeater, Jomeimei, WilliamZLi, ethan-chan2, mchoi574055)
name_original: Best Game Ever (Brandmuffin, wgarland, RealSHeater, Jomeimei, WilliamZLi, ethan-chan2, mchoi574055)
description:
A simple and elegant puzzle game. Give it the respect it deserves by playing the RIGHT way.

-

-

Hello Players! After days of sweat and toil, I am proud to present to you: my magnum opus.

A box, a key, and a charming charismatic Narrator (yours truly), all wrapped up in a beautiful package. What more could you need? After playing my masterpiece, I promise you'll never need to download another game again!

If you get stuck, don't worry, we all make mistakes! (Most of us, anyway) Just do as I say and you'll be just fine. 

IMPORTANT: After you solve one room, press Play again to face another challenging puzzle...

See you there!
